original_text: He causes priests to become ashamed. He removes the power of important people. He causes priests to become ashamed.
korean_text: 제사장들을 벌거벗겨 끌어 가시고 권력이 있는 자를 넘어뜨리시며

sentences.original_text: He causes priests to become ashamed.
He removes the power of important people.
He causes priests to become ashamed.
